description:
Welcome to the Upper West Side of Manhattan in this fully furnished one bedroom apartment rental on 88th Street and Columbus Avenue. This apartment is situated on the fifth floor of a 19th-century walk-up building.

The interior of this listing has a calm and neutral décor. The Living Room is furnished with a sofa, marble coffee table, dining table, an air conditioning unit, and cable TV. The kitchen is fully modern and equipped with an oven, fridge, freezer, toaster, coffeemaker, and microwav
name: Nice 1 bedroom, 1 min by walk from Central Park
review: Very well situated with subway stations very close, it's clean, and the owner treated us very well. We could comunicate with him easily.
